item.title: Right way install Context (right menu)
item.description:
如何添加系统右键菜单? 我把我的全收集在这里!

Reference: https://www.zhihu.com/question/48091139

How to

Save the code below as foobar.reg and execute it.

Notice ! Modify path !

  1. Modify the path to your path! For instance: C:\\Users\\foobar\\scoop\\apps\\git\\current\\git-bash.exe to \\you\\dope\\path\\sth.exe.
  2. Save the content as .reg file and execute it as administrator.
